```{r}
source("LoadData.R", encoding = "UTF-8")
source("Stats_functions.R")
source("PLS_functions.R")
```

```{r}
print("Analyse plspm")
tab = pls_analysis(aesthetic_df, narrative_df, objectives_df,
             "Aesthetic Scenario", "Narrative Scenario", "Objectives Scenario",
             type=7, color_lim = NULL)

print("Valeurs pour le scenario Aesthetic")
aesthetic_check = pls_analysis_values(tab[[1]][["traits_dfs_pls"]])
knitr::kable(aesthetic_check, "simple")

print("Valeurs pour le scenario Narrative")
narrative_check = pls_analysis_values(tab[[2]][["traits_dfs_pls"]])
knitr::kable(narrative_check, "simple")

print("Valeurs pour le scenario Goals")
goals_check     = pls_analysis_values(tab[[3]][["traits_dfs_pls"]])
knitr::kable(goals_check, "simple")
```
